about_the_game:
About the game:

Embark on a harrowing journey through a chilling dungeon of psychological torment in this immersive retro 2D horror game.
A relentless adversary, an embodiment of your deepest fears, stalks your every move. The faster you run, the closer it draws, an ever-present force that mirrors your own frantic heartbeat. Each step reverberates through the dungeon, your heart pounding in tandem with the encroaching dread.

Heartbeat mechanic

Game features a heartbeat mechanic, where your heartbeat rises by running and getting scared. The closer the enemy is the more scared you are, also increasing the visual artifacts.

Is there even an escape...?

Is there even an escape...?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2,00 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 21.04 or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 3,10 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU (like NVIDIA GTX 660/AMD Radeon HD 7870)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10 (Yosemite) or similar
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Storage: 200 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or similar
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 200 GB available space

name: sorry

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x32
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2,00 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2,00 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Navigate a chilling dungeon of psychological torment in this retro 2D horror game. Try to escape. You are not alone. The faster you run, the faster the relentless enemy catches up. Your heart is pounding, and it's closer with every heartbeat. The end is near...
